required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical, Immunological, Morphological and Genetic Characteristics of Patients With Dysferlinopathy in the RF
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Clinical, Immunological, Morphological, Molecular and Genetic Characteristics of Patients With Limb-girdle Muscular Dystrophy Type R2 (Type 2B) in the Russian Federation

collaborator.agency: S. M. Kirov Military Medical Academy of the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate specific characteristics of phenotype, immune status, molecular and genetic as well as morphological characteristics of adult patients with limb-girdle muscular dystrophy R2 in various regions of the Russian Federation.

primary_outcome.measure: Сlinical status of patients with dysferlinopathy (MMT score)
primary_outcome.description: Muscle strength will be assessed using MMT and will be expressed in points for each of the muscle groups assessed.

primary_outcome.measure: Сlinical status of patients with dysferlinopathy ( North Star Assessment for dysferlinopathy)
primary_outcome.description: North Star Assessment for Dysferlinopathy (NSAD) is a functional scale that will be used to measure motor performance in individuals with dysferlinopathy (includes 29 items).

primary_outcome.measure: Сlinical status of patients with dysferlinopathy (Hand Held Dynamometry).
primary_outcome.description: Hand held dynamometry using the MicroFET2 myometer will be utilized to capture isometric muscle strength. Maximum strength in kilograms will be reported for each muscle group.

primary_outcome.measure: Сlinical status of patients with dysferlinopathy (6-minute walk test)
primary_outcome.description: The participant will be asked to complete maximal distance in 6 minet as quickly as safely possible and the time in seconds is recorded.

primary_outcome.measure: Clinical blood test (level of hemoglobin)
primary_outcome.description: Level of hemoglobin is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Clinical blood test. Level of hematocrit
primary_outcome.description: Level of hematocrit (%) is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Clinical blood test. Level of RBC
primary_outcome.description: Level of RBC is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Clinical blood test. Level of WBC
primary_outcome.description: Level of WBC is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Clinical blood test. Levels of ESR
primary_outcome.description: Levels of ESR (mm/h) is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Clinical blood test. Level of platelets
primary_outcome.description: Level of platelets is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Biochemical blood test.
primary_outcome.description: Levels of potassium (mmol/l) is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Biochemical blood test. Level of sodium
primary_outcome.description: Level of sodium (mmol/l) is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Biochemical blood test. Level of calcium
primary_outcome.description: Level of calcium (mmol/l) is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Biochemical blood test. Level of creatinine
primary_outcome.description: Level of creatinine (μmol/l) is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Biochemical blood test. Level of glucose
primary_outcome.description: Level of glucose (mmol/l) is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Biochemical blood test. Level of uric acid
primary_outcome.description: Level of uric acid (μmol/l) is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Biochemical blood test. Level of urea
primary_outcome.description: Level of urea (mmol/l) is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Biochemical blood test. Level of ALT
primary_outcome.description: Level of ALT (U/l) is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Biochemical blood test. Level of AST
primary_outcome.description: Level of AST (U/l) is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Biochemical blood test. Level of total protein
primary_outcome.description: Level of total protein (g/l) is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Biochemical blood test. Level of CPK
primary_outcome.description: Level of CPK (U/l) is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Biochemical blood test. Level of triglycerides
primary_outcome.description: Level of triglycerides (mmol/l) is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Biochemical blood test. Level of CRP
primary_outcome.description: Level of CRP (mg/l) is planned to be assessed in patients with dysferlinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: Blood cytokine levels in subjects with dysferlinopathy and healthy volunteers.
primary_outcome.description: To assess average blood cytokine levels in subjects with dysferlinopathy in various regions of the Russian Federation; To assess average blood cytokine levels in healthy subjects. Blood serum cytokine profiling will be performed with the use of the multiparameter fluorescent diagnostic system Luminex 200 and the Bio-Plex Pro Human 27-Plex Panel (Bio-Rad, Hercules, USA) in accordance with the manufacturer's instructions. The data obtained will be processed with the use of MasterPlex CT control and MasterPlex QT analysis software (Hitachi Software, San Bruno, USA). The following cytokine Levels will be assessed in the study:FGF2, Eotaxin,G-CSF, GM-CSF, IFN-γ, IL-1β, 1IL-1ra, IL-2, IL-4, IL-5, IL-6, IL-7, IL-8, IL-9, IL-10, IL-12 p70, IL-13, IL-15, IL-17, IP-10, MCP-1/MCAF, MIP-1α, MIP-1β,PDGF-BB, RANTES, TNF-α, VEGF.

primary_outcome.measure: Autoantibodies in patients with dysferlinopathy.
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of antibodу level against skeletal muscle antigens; an antinuclear factor (ANA), an extractable nuclear antigen.

primary_outcome.measure: Muscle MRI in patients with dysferlinopathy.
primary_outcome.description: To characterize muscle involvement based on MRI results; To evaluate the progression of muscle involvement based on repeated MRI once year;

primary_outcome.measure: Subpopulation compositions of T-lymphocytes in subjects with dysferlinopathy.
primary_outcome.description: • To characterize changes in subpopulation compositions of T-lymphocytes in %.

primary_outcome.measure: Subpopulation compositions of B-lymphocytes in subjects with dysferlinopathy.
primary_outcome.description: • To characterize changes in subpopulation compositions of B-lymphocytes in %.

primary_outcome.measure: Subpopulation compositions of phagocytic activity of leukocytes in subjects with dysferlinopathy (NBT test)
primary_outcome.description: • To characterize changes in phagocytic activity of leukocytes (NBT test in CU).

primary_outcome.measure: Subpopulation compositions of phagocytic activity of leukocytes in subjects with dysferlinopathy.
primary_outcome.description: • To characterize changes in phagocytic activity of leukocytes (a phagocyte number in CU).

primary_outcome.measure: Subpopulation compositions of phagocytic activity of leukocytes in subjects with dysferlinopathy (lysosomal-cation test).
primary_outcome.description: • To characterize changes in phagocytic activity of leukocytes (lysosomal-cation test in CU).

primary_outcome.measure: Subpopulation compositions of phagocytic activity of leukocytes (a phagocytic index) in subjects with dysferlinopathy.
primary_outcome.description: • To characterize changes in phagocytic activity of leukocytes (a phagocytic index).

primary_outcome.measure: Gait pattern and balance characteristics in patients with limb-girdle muscular dystrophy R2.
primary_outcome.description: To determine a gait pattern characteristics in patients with limb-girdle muscular dystrophy R2 using electrophysiological techniques (Neurosoft Gait Assessment System "STEDIS").

primary_outcome.measure: Cardiac function (assessed by Echocardiography). LV
primary_outcome.description: The absolute and relative sizes of the left ventricle (LV) index will be determin.

primary_outcome.measure: Cardiac function (assessed by Echocardiography). LV mass
primary_outcome.description: The absolute and relative sizes of the LV mass index will be determin.

primary_outcome.measure: Cardiac function (assessed by Echocardiography). Myocardium mass
primary_outcome.description: The absolute and relative sizes of the myocardium mass index will be determin.

primary_outcome.measure: Cardiac function (assessed by Echocardiography). RV
primary_outcome.description: The absolute and relative sizes of the right ventricle (RV) index will be determin.

primary_outcome.measure: Cardiac function (assessed by MRI scan with a gadolinium-based contrast agent). Volumetric evaluation of LV mass
primary_outcome.description: Volumetric evaluation of LV mass by manual tracing will be perform. An MRI of the heart will assess fibrosis.

primary_outcome.measure: Cardiac function (assessed by Echocardiography). LA
primary_outcome.description: The absolute and relative sizes of the left atrium (LA) index will be determin.

primary_outcome.measure: Cardiac function (assessed by Electrocardiography). Outcome 13
primary_outcome.description: To assess rhythm characteristic, P-wave, QRS, T-wave duration; PR, RR, QT intervals; PR, ST segments.

primary_outcome.measure: Cardiac function (assessed by MRI scan with a gadolinium-based contrast agent). Volumetric evaluation of EF
primary_outcome.description: Volumetric evaluation of EF by manual tracing will be perform.

primary_outcome.measure: Cardiac function (assessed by MRI scan with a gadolinium-based contrast agent).
primary_outcome.description: Volumetric evaluation of volume by manual tracing will be perform.

primary_outcome.measure: Morphological muscle study
primary_outcome.description: If it was necessary to confirm the causation of mutations in the dysferlin gene, the patients underwent muscle biopsy. To study the expression (immunohistochemistry and western-blotting) and distribution of dysferlin in impaired muscles of subjects with LGMDR2.

arm_group.description: Patients with a genetically confirmed dysferlinopathy.

study_pop.textblock: Study participants will be identified through self-selection and direct recruitment options. Participants will be identified from the population of individuals who are followed at the neuromuscular clinics. Participants will also be solicited from the DYSF Russian registry.

reference.citation: Khaiboullina SF, Martynova EV, Bardakov SN, Mavlikeev MO, Yakovlev IA, Isaev AA, Deev RV, Rizvanov AA. Serum Cytokine Profile in a Patient Diagnosed with Dysferlinopathy. Case Rep Med. 2017;2017:3615354. doi: 10.1155/2017/3615354. Epub 2017 Apr 13.

Umakhanova ZR, Bardakov SN, Mavlikeev MO, Chernova ON, Magomedova RM, Akhmedova PG, Yakovlev IA, Dalgatov GD, Fedotov VP, Isaev AA, Deev RV. Corrigendum: Twenty-Year Clinical Progression of Dysferlinopathy in Patients from Dagestan. Front Neurol. 2017 Apr 18;8:145. doi: 10.3389/fneur.2017.00145. eCollection 2017.
